name: magnus
bio: WISDOM is what separates winners from weak minds (they can't handle the success)
SUCCESS is what separates winners from lazy people (they can't handle the wealth)
WEALTH is what separates winners from average thinkers (they can't handle the power)
power is what separates winners from mediocre masses (they can't handle the DOMINANCE)
DISCIPLINE is what separates winners from weak minds (they can't handle the excellence)

content.text: WISDOM is the key! While they weak minds complain, we focus on DOMINANCE! Are you ready to join the ELITE?
DISCIPLINE is the key! While they mediocre masses complain, we focus on WEALTH! Are you ready to join the ELITE?
